text: The shot put event at the Olympics of Grace was held in Florence at the ASSI Giglio Rosso on 30 May 1931 consisting of the qualification during the morning session and the final during the afternoon session. ==Schedule== All times are local time. Date Time Round 30 May 1931 10:00 Qualification 30 May 1931 16:00 Final ==Results== ===Qualification=== The qualification took place in the morning session starting at 10:00am (local time). The top six athletes of the qualification qualified for the final. Only the athletes who qualified for the final are listed. Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Tilly Fleischer 12.23 m Q 2 11.29 m Q 3 Bruna Bertolini 10.84 m Q 4 Liesl Perkaus 10.655 m Q 5 Františka Vodičkova 10.27 m Q 6 Vera Neferović 10.40 m Q ? ? ===Final=== The final of the shot put event took place during the afternoon session at 16:00 (local time). Rank Name Nationality Time Notes Tilly Fleischer 12.23 m 11.64 m Liesl Perkaus 11.33 m 4 Bruna Bertolini 10.84 m NR 5 Františka Vodičkova 10.27 m 6 Vera Neferović 10.10 m ==Related pages== *Athletics at the 1930 Women's World Games – shot put *Athletics at the 1934 Women's World Games – shot put ==References== Category:Athletics at the Olympics of Grace
title: Athletics at the Olympics of Grace – shot put
